page.title: 15Ballingry - Atmosphere (1)
page.content: When you go on a bike you have to watch because dogs chase you and jump up on you. There are hundreds of dogs in Ballingry. Tommy McCann (10) We have two greyhounds. They get two meals a day- at about 7.30am and 6pm. We have a cupboard full of things for the dogs: glucose, cod liver oil,leads brushes, muzzles, haps to keep them dry, sardines for when they race and towels. The nearest track is Thornton. Tony McAndrew (11) At the bus stop there is a lot of activity at about five o'clock. This is because everybody finishes their work at about that time. Men carry piece bags and flasks and some have 'Daily Records' under their arms. Ladies carry overalls, shopping bags and loads of messages. Sandra Smith(10)
